EmailTemplate.name: PCS QBDT SPA
EmailTemplate.subject: Intuit QuickBooks Payments
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Thank you for taking time to discuss your business needs with me today. Attached is information about how you can get paid more ways fast in your latest version of QuickBooks! • Let customer pay you faster with credit cards and bank transfers • Accept payments through QuickBooks, emailed invoices, phone and tablet • QuickBooks automatically updates and notifies you when you’re paid Click here to watch a DEMO and see Intuit Payments Services in action! Below is the pricing information we discussed for the plans that would work for your business.
Pay-As-You-Go Monthly Service Fee $0 Monthly Minimum $0 Rates Swipe** 2.40% Keyed 3.40% Transaction Fee $0.25 ACH Fee $0.50
Low Monthly Rates Monthly Service Fee $19.95 Monthly Minimum $0 Rates Swipe** 1.75.40% Keyed 3.15% Transaction Fee $0.25 ACH Fee $0.50
** Based on the card type, swiped transactions may get the higher rate (ex. rewards card, corp card)
If you have any additional questions, or would like to turn on this service, please reply to this e-mail or call me directly at the phone number below.
Thank You for Your Business
